mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bookinfo WHERE bookname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT distinct(con_no),bookinfo.bookImageURL,bookinfo.bookname,bookinfo.book_no FROM bookinfo INNER JOIN board USING(con_no);
select * from board inner join bookinfo using(con_no) inner join member_tbl using(mem_no) WHERE book_no=#{book_no};
select count(*) from board inner join bookinfo using(con_no) WHERE book_no=#{book_no};

select C.* from(select A.* from(select b.board_no,b.title,b.review,b.writedate,b.star_rate,m.nickname from board b inner join bookinfo using(con_no) inner join member_tbl m using(mem_no) WHERE book_no=#{book_no} order by board_no desc) A LIMIT #{totalRecord}) C LIMIT #{startRecord},#{onePageRecord};
